TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler

summary.span: 將 COM 介面封送處理 (Marshal) 至 .NET Framework 介面或 介面，或是反向操作。

span.span: Marshals the COM interface to either the .NET Framework interface, or to the interface, and vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 CLR 不會自動使用此自訂封送處理器，它必須宣告，如下所示：Because the CLR does not use this custom marshaler automatically, it must be declared as follows: ``` void UseCustomMarshaler([MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalTypeRef=typeof(ExpandoToDispatchExMarhsaler))] IExpando expando); ```

MemberSignature.Value: public ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler ();
.method public static specialname rtspecialname void .cctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler();

summary.span: 提供靜態類別建構函式。

span.span: Provides the static class constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個成員會在.NET Framework 2.0 版及後續版本中移除。This member is removed in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and subsequent versions.

abstract member CleanUpManagedData : obj -> unit override this.CleanUpManagedData : obj -> unit

param.name: pManagedObj
param.span: 要終結的 Managed 物件。

span.span: The managed object to be destroyed.

summary.span: 針對不需要的 Managed 資料執行必要的清除。

span.span: Performs necessary cleanup of the managed data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 會呼叫這個方法，以清除配置在 managed 資料方法。The CLR calls this method to clean up managed data allocated in the method.

span.span: A pointer to the unmanaged data to be destroyed.

summary.span: 針對不需要的 Unmanaged 資料執行必要的清除。

span.span: Performs necessary cleanup of the unmanaged data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 會呼叫這個方法，以清除 在中所配置的 unmanaged 資料方法。The CLR calls this method to clean up the unmanaged data allocated in the method.

param.span: 可由自訂封送處理器使用的字串 "cookie" 參數。

span.span: String "cookie" parameter that can be used by the custom marshaler.

summary.span: 傳回自訂封送處理器 (Marshaler) 的執行個體。

span.span: Returns an instance of the custom marshaler.

returns.span: 自訂封送處理器的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這並非所有的自訂封送處理器必須實作此方法中，屬於介面定義。All custom marshalers must implement this method, although it is not part of the interface definition.

public: virtual int GetNativeDataSize();
abstract member GetNativeDataSize : unit -> int override this.GetNativeDataSize : unit -> int

summary.span: 傳回待封送處理之 Unmanaged 資料的大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: Returns the size in bytes of the unmanaged data to be marshaled.

returns.span: -1 表示這個封送處理器所處理的型別並非實值型別 (Value Type)。

span.span: -1 to indicate the type this marshaler handles is not a value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為不支援在.NET Framework 實值型別的自訂封送處理，則這個方法一律會傳回-1。Because custom marshaling of value types is not supported in the .NET Framework, this method always returns -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual IntPtr MarshalManagedToNative (object pManagedObj);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int MarshalManagedToNative(object pManagedObj) cil managed
Public Overridable Function MarshalManagedToNative (pManagedObj As Object) As IntPtr
public: virtual IntPtr MarshalManagedToNative(System::Object ^ pManagedObj);
abstract member MarshalManagedToNative : obj -> nativeint override this.MarshalManagedToNative : obj -> nativeint

param.name: pManagedObj
param.span: 要轉換的 Managed 物件。

span.span: The managed object to be converted.

summary.span: 封送處理物件，從 Managed 程式碼到 Unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: Marshals an object from managed code to unmanaged code.
A pointer to the unmanaged object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 會呼叫這個方法時指定的執行個體的受管理的物件，用來將該物件從 managed 程式碼轉換成 unmanaged 程式碼，並讓指標回到適當的 unmanaged 物件，表示該物件的 [COM] 檢視。The CLR calls this method with the specified instance of a managed object to convert that object from managed code to unmanaged code, and it returns a pointer to the appropriate unmanaged object, representing the COM view of that object.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object MarshalNativeToManaged (IntPtr pNativeData);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object MarshalNativeToManaged(native int pNativeData) cil managed
Public Overridable Function MarshalNativeToManaged (pNativeData As IntPtr) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ MarshalNativeToManaged(IntPtr pNativeData);
abstract member MarshalNativeToManaged : nativeint -> obj override this.MarshalNativeToManaged : nativeint -> obj

param.name: pNativeData
param.span: 待轉換的 Unmanaged 物件的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the unmanaged object to be converted.

summary.span: 封送處理物件，從 Unmanaged 程式碼到 Managed 程式碼。

span.span: Marshals an object from unmanaged code to managed code.
A managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 會呼叫這個方法，以將該物件與 unmanaged 程式碼，managed 程式碼，unmanaged 物件的指定指標，並傳回代表 unmanaged 資料的 managed 的檢視的受管理的物件。The CLR calls this method with the specified pointer to an unmanaged object to convert that object from unmanaged code to managed code, and returns a managed object representing the managed view of the unmanaged data.

span.span: is .
